In this post I'll present a simple method to extract and analyze stock price using **tidyquant**, an R package that encapsulate other packages, including **quantmod**, that is another package that has an API to request Yahoo Finance data. Thus tidyquant will supply stock market data in a tidy way (organized way).

This package request the Symbols (stock price names) in order to bring the necessary data. You can indentify this information on Yahoo [webpage](https://finance.yahoo.com/), searching for a specific company and getting its symbol.
